images.description: SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 3047
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy NGC 3047
SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 3047, also showing PGC 28572, which is sometimes mis-designated as either NGC 3047A or NGC 3047B, neither of which is correct
SDSS image of elliptical galaxy PGC 28572, which is sometimes mis-designated as either NGC 3047A or NGC 3047B, neither of which is correct
